product.title: Great Day for UP | Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Great Day for UP
by Dr. Seuss

Dr. Seuss gives readers this humorous story all about the word "up"—one of the first sight words taught to children learning to read. In Great Day for UP the energy and rhythm of the text is clearly illustrated with jolly pictures by Quentin Blake. This book will have everyone, everywhere, feeling up! (Well, almost everyone . . . Not surprisingly, Dr. Seuss may have a surprise for his readers.)

Tie-in Activity: Most parents know all about bedtime stories, but what about wake-up stories? Snuggling together and sharing a book can be a relaxing way to transition your child from a long nap.
